brand.description: Brand associated with the IMSI registration.

country.description: Country where the IMSI is registered.

first-seen.description: When the IMSI has been accessible or seen for the first time.

imsi.description: A usually unique International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI) is allocated to each mobile subscriber in the GSM/UMTS/EPS system. IMSI can also refer to International Mobile Station Identity in the ITU nomenclature.

operator.description: Operator associated with the IMSI registration.

seq.description: A sequence number for the collection

text.description: A description of the IMSI record.

tmsi-1.description: Temporary Mobile Subscriber Identities (TMSI) to visiting mobile subscribers can be allocated.

tmsi-2.description: Temporary Mobile Subscriber Identities (TMSI) to visiting mobile subscribers can be allocated.

description: IMSI Catcher entry object based on the open source IMSI cather
name: imsi-catcher
